title: What happened to the "quick switch between apps" feature? It disappeared on latest update.
content:
I have missed the "quick switch between apps" feature since taking the latest upgrade.  I used to be able to go through all of my open apps with a single slow horizontal swipe of my thumb from the very bottom of the screen where the home button is.  Now I can only do it with swipe up and then go through history. Not as convenient to do with one hand as the other cooler feature.

This is described at minute 4:30 of this video.

https://youtu.be/JRV-1WnyUOk

Thanks,

Mike
